type: Type of losgistics object, e.g. air waybill, booking, etc
typeCode: Commonly useed codes for document type, e.g. jfwb, jfhl etc. Leave nlank if unknown
issuedBy: Internet of logistics code of issuing party.
key: JSON field name of code that identifies this logistics object, e.g. 'waybill number', 'UPID' etc.

payment-means.PaymentMeansIDIssuer: Issuer of the payment means codes - e.g. EDIFACT
payment-means.PaymentMeansID: Payment means code - e.g. EDIFACT list 4461
payment-means.PaymentTermIDIssuer: Indicates the Payment Terms issuer - e.g. UNECE
payment-means.PaymentTermID: Indicates the Payment Terms code - e.g. UNECE Recommendation 17 Code List

BankAccount.BankIdentiferCode: Bank Identifier Code (BIC) or SWIFT code
BankAccount.BankSortCode: Bank Sort Number assigned to the branch of the bank
